Control Name: CP-9 (3) SEPARATE STORAGE FOR CRITICAL INFORMATION
Control Statement: The organization stores backup copies of [Assignment: organization-defined critical information system software and other security-related information] in a separate facility or in a fire-rated container that is not collocated with the operational system.
